page.title: Datel Wireless 'N' Networking Adapter For Xbox 360

revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Wireless 'N' Networking Adapter For Xbox 360 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Datel |model = Wireless 'N' Networking Adapter For Xbox 360 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 2, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Datel_Wireless_%27N%27_Networking_Adapter_For_Xbox_360 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded dongle
|vendor_id = 045e |device_id = 02a8 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = WLE-XA10009 |icid = 9084A-XB1159 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |oui = 00:1D:D8
|chip1 = Atheros;AR7010;AR7010-AL1A, A16764C, 1051, KOREA; |chip2 = Atheros;AR9280;AR9280-AL1A, N3B624.00B, 1050, TAIWAN; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = none |windriv = none
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/03/2010 |estreldate = 01/15/2011 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 854856002141 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B003D3OOYY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B003UYTGGW |asin_country2 = GB |multirev2 = United Kingdom
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "Ref2036" is etched onto the top layer of the board. :The board is using an AR7010-AL1A and an AR9280-AL1A. ::The AR7010 UART appears to be accessible via test points TP5 (Rx) and TP6 (Tx). There is an unknown [http://www.rawscience.co.uk/ '''Raw Science'''] (systems analysis and reverse engineering division of '''Datel''') IC on the board. It is labeled XB102.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-wireless/msg68737.html The device is not supported by ath9k_htc at this time (and may never be).]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal, from m86" mode="slideshow"> Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_bot_in_case.jpg|board bot, in casing 1 Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_bot_in_case2.jpg|board bot, in casing 2 Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_bot_in_case_altL.jpg|board bot, in casing 3, alt. lighting Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_bot_in_case_connside_closeup.jpg|board bot, in casing, closeup of board, USB conn. side Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_bot_OoC.jpg|board bottom, out of casing Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_top_OoC.jpg|board top Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_top_shield_off.jpg|board top, shield off 2 Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_top_shield_off_altL.jpg|board top, shield off 2 Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_board_top_shield_off_altL2.jpg| board top, shield off 3 Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_bt_AR7010-AL1A_andGE_closeup.jpg|AR7010-AL1A and general area Image:Datel_Xbox360_USB_bt_AR9280_plusRF_partial_closeup.jpg|AR9280 and RF section (partial) </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
